001package org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.utils;
002
003import java.util.Arrays;
004import java.util.LinkedHashMap;
005import java.util.List;
006import java.util.Map;
007import java.util.NavigableMap;
008import java.util.TreeMap;
009import java.util.stream.Collectors;
010import java.util.stream.Stream;
011
012import static java.util.function.Function.identity;
013import static java.util.stream.Collectors.counting;
014import static java.util.stream.Collectors.groupingBy;
015import static java.util.stream.Collectors.summingInt;
016
017/**
018 * Utility-Class to build a counting-map from the {@link Stream} of any objects
019 * that have properly implemented {@link Object#equals(Object)} and {@link Object#hashCode()}
020 * (and {@link Comparable#compareTo(Object) for sorted counting-maps}).
021 */
022public class CountingUtils {
023
024    public static <V> Map<V, Long> countingMapLong(Stream<V> valuesStream) {
025        return valuesStream.collect(groupingBy(identity(), counting()));
026    }
027    public static <V> Map<V, Integer> countingMap(Stream<V> valuesStream) {
028        return valuesStream.collect(groupingBy(identity(), summingInt(v -> 1)));
029    }
030    public static <V> NavigableMap<V, Integer> countingSortedMap(Stream<V> valuesStream) {
031        return valuesStream.collect(groupingBy(identity(), TreeMap::new, summingInt(v -> 1)));
032    }
033    public static <V> LinkedHashMap<V, Integer> countingLinkedMap(Stream<V> valuesStream) {
034        return valuesStream.collect(groupingBy(identity(), LinkedHashMap::new, summingInt(v -> 1)));
035    }
036
037    // ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
038
039    private CountingUtils() {
040        // prohibit the creation of utility-class instance
041        throw new UnsupportedOperationException("Cannot instantiate a utility-class " + getClass().getName());
042    }
043}
